title: Foundation Barista Course
description: Learn espresso basics, milk steaming, and café workflow in a real barista setting. Perfect for beginners.
longDescription: This course is designed for aspiring baristas. You'll dive into espresso theory, learn milk texturing, and practice customer service in a real café environment. Perfect for beginners seeking hands-on coffee experience.

faqs.q: Do I need any experience to join?
faqs.a: No prior experience is required. This course is perfect for beginners.
Yes, you'll receive a Barista Certificate after successful completion.
